title: House for sale @ Dehiwala
details:
House for sale @ Dehiwala


• 10.7 perches, (4200sq,ft)
• 6 Bed Rooms ( upper 4, Down 2 / 2 A/C )
• 4 Baths ( 1 Attached, 2 solar hot water / Bath tub )
• 2 Living / 2 Dining with 2 TV areas
• Pantry with curry kitchen ( cooker / oven / Granite top part )
• Front terrace with balconies
• large rooftop with Hall area & Toilet
• Saparate entrance & Electricity / Can use as 2 units
• Pipe born water with sump & over head 2 water tanks
• Fully tiled / Bricked Walls / Iron grills / Ceiling fans
• Quiet residential area

Parking -
Parking space for 3 vehicals

Boundaries -
surrounded by well built walls with remote & wicket gate

Access road -
25 Feet wide Carpet rd ( dead end )

Nearest cities -
Mount Lavinia / Pepiliyana / Kohuwala
Ratmalana / Boralesgamuwa / Nedimala
Attidiya / Bellantara Nedimala

100m to Pepiliyana, Dehiwala main Rd
Very closed proximity to Dehiwala city limit

46 million , 460 Laks (Negotiable)
